author: MilanoBicocca-pix
body:
#### PR description:
Minor fix to realign Master branch to the 11_1_X release as commented in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/30690#issuecomment-664971122
Changes:
- Updated BeamSpot DQM fake clients to have the correct `lastLumiFile` parameter

Once this is merged, #30696 could be unholded.

#### Backport
The backport of this PR is included in #30696
title: Fix lastLumiFile parameter in fake BeamSpot clients
